005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.YearMonthDurationItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.time.Period;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018
019/**
020 * An atomic Metapath item containing a duration data value in years, months,
021 * and days.
022 */
023public interface IYearMonthDurationItem extends IDurationItem {
024  /**
025   * Get the type information for this item.
026   *
027   * @return the type information
028   */
029  @NonNull
030  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IYearMonthDurationItem> type() {
031    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.YEAR_MONTH_DURATION.getItemType();
032  }
033
034  @Override
035  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IYearMonthDurationItem> getType() {
036    return type();
037  }
038
039  /**
040   * Construct a new year month day duration item using the provided string
041   * {@code value}.
042   *
043   * @param value
044   *          a string representing a year month day duration
045   * @return the new item
046   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
047   *           if the provided string value is not a day/time duration value
048   *           according to ISO 8601
049   */
050  @NonNull
051  static IYearMonthDurationItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
052    try {
053      Period period = ObjectUtils.notNull(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.YEAR_MONTH_DURATION.parse(value).withDays(0));
054      return valueOf(period);
055    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
056      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
057          null,
058          String.format("Invalid year/month duration value '%s'. %s",
059              value,
060              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
061          ex);
062    }
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Construct a new year month day duration item using the provided
067   * {@code value}.
068   *
069   * @param value
070   *          a duration
071   * @return the new item
072   */
073  @NonNull
074  static IYearMonthDurationItem valueOf(@NonNull Period value) {
075    return new YearMonthDurationItemImpl(ObjectUtils.notNull(value.withDays(0)));
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Construct a new year month day duration item using the provided values.
080   *
081   * @param years
082   *          the number of years in the period
083   * @param months
084   *          the number of months in the period
085   * @return the new item
086   */
087  @NonNull
088  static IYearMonthDurationItem valueOf(int years, int months) {
089    return valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(Period.of(years, months, 0)));
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
094   *
095   * @param item
096   *          the item to cast
097   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
098   *         cast to this type
099   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
100   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
101   */
102  @NonNull
103  static IYearMonthDurationItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
104    try {
105      return item instanceof IYearMonthDurationItem
106          ? (IYearMonthDurationItem) item
107          : valueOf(item.asString());
108    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
109      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
110      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
111    }
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Get the "wrapped" duration value.
116   *
117   * @return the underlying duration value
118   */
119  @NonNull
120  Period asPeriod();
121
122  @Override
123  default IYearMonthDurationItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
124    return cast(item);
125  }
126
127  @Override
128  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
129    return compareTo(cast(item));
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Compares this value with the argument.
134   *
135   * @param item
136   *          the item to compare with this value
137   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
138   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
139   */
140  default int compareTo(IYearMonthDurationItem item) {
141    Period thisPeriod = asPeriod().normalized();
142    Period thatPeriod = item.asPeriod().normalized();
143
144    int result = Integer.compare(thisPeriod.getYears(), thatPeriod.getYears());
145    return result == 0 ? Integer.compare(thisPeriod.getMonths(), thatPeriod.getMonths()) : result;
146  }
147}
